computer_vision.label: Computer Vision
computer_vision.description: Tasks involving image and video analysis

image_classification.label: Image Classification
examples: Classify dog breeds from photos
Medical image diagnosis for X-rays
Quality control inspection on assembly line
Categorize NASA telescope images
Identify plant species from leaf photos
Sort product images by category
Detect skin conditions from dermatology photos
Classify satellite images by land use type
Recognize handwritten digits
Identify bird species from wildlife camera

object_detection.label: Object Detection
object_detection.description: Identifying and locating objects within images
examples: Traffic sign detection for self-driving cars
Face detection in group photos
Security camera monitoring for intruders
Count stars in NASA images
Count animals in satellite images
Detect pedestrians in street footage
Find defects on a circuit board
Locate tumors in medical scans
Detect vehicles in drone footage
Find and count fish in underwater video

semantic_segmentation.label: Semantic Segmentation
examples: Medical image segmentation for organ boundaries
Autonomous driving scene understanding
Satellite imagery land cover analysis
Segment tumors from healthy tissue in MRI
Label each pixel in a street scene
Separate foreground from background in photos
Crop field boundary detection from aerial images
Segment buildings from satellite photos
Cell segmentation in microscopy images
Flood area mapping from drone imagery

natural_language_processing.label: Natural Language Processing
natural_language_processing.description: Tasks involving text understanding and generation

text_classification.label: Text Classification
examples: Email spam detection
News article categorization by topic
Customer inquiry routing to departments
Classify support tickets by priority
Tag blog posts with relevant categories
Filter toxic comments in a forum
Categorize legal documents by case type
Sort resumes by job role
Classify bug reports as critical or minor
Detect phishing emails automatically

sentiment_analysis.label: Sentiment Analysis
examples: Product review analysis on Amazon
Social media monitoring for brand perception
Customer feedback analysis from surveys
Analyze movie review sentiment
Detect negative tone in support conversations
Gauge public opinion on Twitter about a product
Rate restaurant reviews as positive or negative
Measure employee satisfaction from feedback forms
Analyze app store reviews for user sentiment
Track sentiment trends in news coverage

text_generation.label: Text Generation
examples: Content creation for marketing blog
Chatbot responses for customer service
Article writing assistant
Create a chatbot that answers FAQ questions
Build a virtual assistant for customer support
Generate product descriptions automatically
Write email drafts from bullet points
Create dialogue for a conversational AI
Auto-generate social media captions
Story writing assistant for creative fiction

named_entity_recognition.label: Named Entity Recognition
named_entity_recognition.description: Identifying and extracting entities from text
examples: Extract person names from news articles
Location identification in travel reviews
Company name extraction from financial filings
Tag medical entities in clinical notes
Extract dates and events from legal contracts
Identify drug names in research papers
Pull product names from customer emails
Extract addresses from invoices
Identify gene and protein names in biomedical text
Tag organization names in government documents

code_assistant.label: Code Assistant
code_assistant.description: Understanding, generating, and refactoring source code
examples: Review this repository and suggest refactors
Explain this function and write tests for it
Suggest improvements to this Python module
Generate a function to parse JSON data
I need help reviewing my javascript code
Help me refactor this code module
Write unit tests for my REST API endpoints
Debug this stack trace from my Node.js app
Convert this Java class to Python
Autocomplete code suggestions while I type

embedding.label: Embeddings & Retrieval
embedding.description: Converting text to vector representations for semantic search and retrieval
examples: Create embeddings for semantic search
Build a RAG system for document retrieval
Find similar documents using vectors
Encode sentences for similarity matching
Set up semantic search for my knowledge base
Generate text embeddings for a vector database
Index product descriptions for similarity search
Embed FAQ entries for retrieval augmented generation
Vectorize customer queries for nearest-neighbor lookup
Build a document similarity engine

translation.label: Translation
examples: Translate English documents to Spanish
Build a multilingual translation service
Convert French text to English
Machine translation for website content
Translate user interface strings for localization
Real-time chat translation between languages
Translate product descriptions for international store
Convert Japanese customer reviews to English
Subtitle translation for video content
Translate technical documentation to multiple languages

summarization.label: Summarization
summarization.description: Condensing long text into shorter summaries
examples: Summarize long articles into key points
Create executive summaries of documents
Generate meeting notes from transcripts
Condense research papers into abstracts
Summarize customer support chat logs
Create a TLDR for lengthy email threads
Summarize legal contracts into plain language
Generate daily news digests from multiple sources
Shorten product reviews into brief highlights
Summarize earnings call transcripts

question_answering.label: Question Answering
question_answering.description: Answering questions based on context or knowledge
examples: Answer questions from documents
Build a QA system for customer support
Extract answers from knowledge base
Reading comprehension system
Answer questions about a product manual
Find answers in a collection of PDF reports
Build a help desk that answers from documentation
Answer patient questions from medical guidelines
Extract specific facts from legal documents
Build a study assistant that answers from textbooks

speech_processing.label: Speech Processing
speech_processing.description: Tasks involving audio and speech analysis

speech_recognition.label: Speech Recognition
examples: Voice command recognition for smart home
Meeting transcription in real time
Podcast subtitles and captions
Transcribe doctor-patient conversations
Convert voicemail recordings to text
Transcribe lecture recordings for students
Real-time speech to text for live captioning
Transcribe call center phone calls
Voice dictation for note-taking app
Convert interview audio recordings to text

text_to_speech.label: Text to Speech
examples: Audiobook generation from text
Voice assistant that speaks responses
Accessibility screen reader with natural voice
Read notifications aloud on mobile device
Generate spoken announcements for transit systems
Convert written articles into audio podcasts
Text to speech for language learning app
Narrate game dialogue with synthetic voices
Pronounce words aloud in a dictionary app
Generate voice prompts for an IVR phone system

time_series.label: Time Series Analysis
time_series.description: Tasks involving temporal data analysis and forecasting

forecasting.label: Time Series Forecasting
forecasting.description: Predicting future values based on historical data
examples: Stock price prediction from historical data
Weather forecasting for the next week
Demand planning for retail inventory
Predict energy consumption for a building
Forecast website traffic for capacity planning
Predict sales revenue for next quarter
Estimate hospital bed occupancy over time
Forecast crop yield from seasonal data
Predict server load for auto-scaling
Revenue projection from historical trends

anomaly_detection.label: Anomaly Detection
anomaly_detection.description: Identifying unusual patterns, outliers, and abnormal behavior in data
examples: Fraud detection in credit card transactions
System monitoring for server outages
Quality control on a production line
Network intrusion detection from traffic logs
Manufacturing defect detection from sensor data
Log anomaly detection in application logs
Detect unusual login patterns for security
Spot equipment failures before they happen
Identify billing anomalies in financial data
Detect abnormal heartbeat patterns in ECG data
